title: In the Lifestyle
description:
A promiscuous comedy fan story turns into tales of swingers clubs and being a part of what's referred to as "The Lifestyle" by some.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
